projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: UI/UX and Graphic Design Development for MVP Product
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: UI/UX and Graphic Design Development for MVP Product

Description: This project focuses on the creation of the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) for our Minimum Viable Product (MVP), alongside the development of graphic designs for marketing materials and PowerPoint presentations. The role requires a blend of creativity and technical skills to ensure the MVP is user-friendly, visually appealing, and aligns with our brand identity. You will work closely with product managers, developers, and the marketing team to deliver a cohesive design experience that meets our users' needs and supports our marketing initiatives.

Skill sets:

           •          Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or similar.

           •          Expertise in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).

           •          Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and manage feedback constructively.

           •          Basic understanding of front-end development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.

Traits expectation:

           •          Creativity: Ability to think outside the box and come up with innovative design solutions.

           •          Attention to Detail: Keen eye for detail to ensure high-quality and pixel-perfect designs.

           •          User Empathy: Strong focus on user needs and behaviors to create intuitive and user-friendly designs.

Expected learning:

           •          Practical Experience: Hands-on experience in designing UI/UX for a real product from conception to launch.

           •          Cross-Functional Collaboration: Experience working with product managers, developers, and marketing teams to deliver a unified product.

           •          Brand Development: Understanding of how to maintain and enhance brand identity through design.

           •          Design Tools Proficiency: Improved proficiency in industry-standard design tools and software.

Specific courses required for project execution: 

           •          Introduction to UI/UX Design

           •          Advanced Prototyping and Wireframing

           •          Advanced Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)

           •          Branding and Visual Communication
